description: This file defines the core domain models for the SkillMaster backend, including entities like Skill, Module, Lesson, ProgressEntry, and UserProgress using Pydantic for data validation and serialization.

classes.name: Lesson
classes.description: A single lesson within a module.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: A module within a skill, containing a list of lessons.

classes.name: Skill
classes.description: A skill that learners can master, consisting of modules and lessons.

classes.name: ProgressEntry
classes.description: A progress entry recording a user's interaction with a lesson.

classes.name: UserProgress
classes.description: Aggregated progress for a user, across skills and lessons.

methods.name: float completion_rate_for_skill(self, skill: Skill)
methods.description: Calculates the completion rate for a given skill, returning a float between 0 and 1.

ctags.name: Lesson
ctags.pattern: /^class Lesson(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: Module
ctags.pattern: /^class Module(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ProgressEntry
ctags.pattern: /^class ProgressEntry(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: Skill
ctags.pattern: /^class Skill(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: UserProgress
ctags.pattern: /^class UserProgress(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: completed
ctags.pattern: /^    completed: bool = Field(False, description="Whether the lesson was completed")$/

ctags.name: completion_rate_for_skill
ctags.pattern: /^    def completion_rate_for_skill(self, skill: Skill) -> float:$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content: str = Field(..., description="Lesson content in markdown or rich-text format")$/

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Brief description of the skill")$/

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Optional description for the module")$/

ctags.name: entries
ctags.pattern: /^    entries: List[ProgressEntry] = Field(default_factory=list, description="All progress entries/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for the lesson")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for the module")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for the skill")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for this progress entry")$/

ctags.name: lesson_id
ctags.pattern: /^    lesson_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier for the related lesson")$/

ctags.name: lessons
ctags.pattern: /^    lessons: List[Lesson] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Lessons contained in this m/

ctags.name: module_id
ctags.pattern: /^    module_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier for the related module")$/

ctags.name: module_id
ctags.pattern: /^    module_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier of the parent module")$/

ctags.name: modules
ctags.pattern: /^    modules: List[Module] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Modules that belong to the /

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    name: str = Field(..., description="Human-friendly name of the skill")$/

ctags.name: order
ctags.pattern: /^    order: int = Field(..., description="Ordering index of the lesson within a module")$/

ctags.name: order
ctags.pattern: /^    order: int = Field(..., description="Ordering index of the module within a skill")$/

ctags.name: score
ctags.pattern: /^    score: Optional[float] = Field(None, description="Optional score or grade for the lesson")$/

ctags.name: skill_id
ctags.pattern: /^    skill_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier for the related skill")$/

ctags.name: skill_id
ctags.pattern: /^    skill_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier of the parent skill")$/

ctags.name: tags
ctags.pattern: /^    tags: List[str] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Tags for discovery and filtering"/

ctags.pattern: /^    timestamp: datetime = Field(default_factory=datetime.utcnow, description="When the progress /

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: str = Field(..., description="Lesson title")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: str = Field(..., description="Module title")$/

ctags.name: user_id
ctags.pattern: /^    user_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier for the user this progress belongs to")$/

ctags.name: user_id
ctags.pattern: /^    user_id: str = Field(..., description="Identifier of the user")$/
